articles.content: Missoula City-County Health Officer Ellen Leahy discusses the county’s goal to flatten the curve early in the pandemic. Gov. Greg Gianforte reversed many state COVID restrictions, prompting several b… [+6028 chars]

articles.author: abc15.com staff
articles.title: Arizona's largest county unable to schedule any more second vaccine doses - ABC15 Arizona
articles.description: Maricopa County Public Health sent out a cryptic tweet Thursday afternoon. It suggested those who’d received their first doses of the Pfizer vaccine at one of its five POD sites, may not be able to get their second dose on time or even at the same location.
articles.content: PHOENIX Maricopa County Public Health sent out a cryptic tweet Thursday afternoon, suggesting those whod received their first doses of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine at one of its five POD sites, may no… [+3455 chars]

articles.author: Julie Anderson World-Herald Staff Writer
articles.title: Nebraska cases of COVID-related syndrome in kids prompt warnings to remain vigilant - Omaha World-Herald
articles.description: In December, Children's Hospital & Medical Center cared for 10 children with Multisystem Inflammatory Syndrome in Children. The hospital has treated six cases so far in January.
articles.content:
A rare syndrome among children thats linked to COVID-19 continues to afflict young Nebraskans.

articles.content: The CDC says you could experience multiple side effects after the vaccine, regardless of which dose you're getting. On the arm where you got the shot, you may have a little bit of pain and swelling, … [+451 chars]
